script.name: Lib.Gen.Anarkis.Pirate.Find.NeedHelp
script.description: Pirate Guild - Locate : Friendly ships under attack

line.comment: * Script used by PG patrol ships to find ships to protect
* Added (Nicoman35): Dfficulty dependent player relation handling
* Altered (Nicoman35): Search for friendly ships in danger
* Added (Nicoman35): New jump/move routine
* Difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3= Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane
*** DEBUG ***
*$script.name = get script name
*$st = sprintf: fmt='Begin Find.NeedHelp for patrol ship %s in sector at %s and end time %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $current.time, $end.time, null
*= null-> call script 'Lib.Debug.Anarkis.Output.Log' : message=$st page.id=8513 script.name=$script.name
*** DEBUG ***
* Get an array of all friendly ships, sorted by distance
* While patrol time not expired
* If cancelled for some reason (!fight.attack.object is a reason -> investigate), restart moving around on task 0
* Check, if any of the friendly ships needs help; begin with the nearest ship to THIS ship
* Ignore ships no longer existing
* Ignore ships not being attacked
* Ignore ships being attacked only by a fighter drone
* Ignore ship if attacker is friendly toward THIS patrol ship
* On lower difficulty levels, ignore ship if attacker is a player-owned ship and player relation to patrol ship is neutral
* Go on attack run, if we have bogies threatening some frendly ship
* Move to new position in sector
* Get XP and return home
* Stop hullcheck on leader and its followers; no need to run the hullcheck any longer, as we are flying home anyway
* Fix 1 : Look for a new home if homebase destroyed

sval.val: Pirate Guild - Locate : Friendly ships under attack
duration in minutes
Script used by PG patrol ships to find ships to protect
Added (Nicoman35): Dfficulty dependent player relation handling
Altered (Nicoman35): Search for friendly ships in danger
Added (Nicoman35): New jump/move routine
Difficulty: 0=Very low 1=Low 2=Medium 3= Strong 4=Very strong 5=Insane

$script.name = get script name
$st = sprintf: fmt='Begin Find.NeedHelp for patrol ship %s in sector at %s and end time %s', [THIS], [SECTOR], $current.time, $end.time, null
= null-> call script 'Lib.Debug.Anarkis.Output.Log' : message=$st page.id=8513 script.name=$script.name
** DEBUG ***
Get an array of all friendly ships, sorted by distance
While patrol time not expired
If cancelled for some reason (!fight.attack.object is a reason -> investigate), restart moving around on task 0
Check, if any of the friendly ships needs help; begin with the nearest ship to THIS ship
Ignore ships no longer existing
Ignore ships not being attacked
Ignore ships being attacked only by a fighter drone
Ignore ship if attacker is friendly toward THIS patrol ship
On lower difficulty levels, ignore ship if attacker is a player-owned ship and player relation to patrol ship is neutral
Go on attack run, if we have bogies threatening some frendly ship
Move to new position in sector
Get XP and return home
Stop hullcheck on leader and its followers; no need to run the hullcheck any longer, as we are flying home anyway
Fix 1 : Look for a new home if homebase destroyed
